metadata.notes: Simplot Turf & Horticulture (formerly Jacklin Seed / Simplot Partners) professional turf fertilizer catalog. Includes BEST granular fertilizers, Polyon controlled-release fertilizers, Duration CR controlled-release fertilizers, TurfGro granular blends, and specialty/liquid products. NPK and secondary nutrient values from guaranteed analysis labels. NOTE: Web research tools were unavailable during compilation. This catalog is based on training knowledge of Simplot products. Recommend verifying against simplot.com/turf-horticulture for the latest catalog.

best_25_5_10_fe.application_notes: BEST professional granular turf fertilizer. Balanced NPK with iron for deep green color. Suitable for fairways, sports turf, and general lawn maintenance. Apply during active growth.

best_21_3_21.application_notes: BEST professional granular fertilizer with balanced 1:1 N to K ratio for stress tolerance and winterization. Ideal for fall applications and summer stress recovery.

best_16_25_12.application_notes: BEST professional starter fertilizer with high phosphorus for establishment. Use at seeding, sodding, or overseeding. Promotes rapid root development and seedling vigor.

best_20_0_20.application_notes: BEST granular turf fertilizer with equal N and K. No phosphorus formulation for use where P is restricted or soil test P is adequate. Iron for enhanced color.

best_21_0_21.application_notes: BEST professional granular with balanced N:K ratio and 6% sulfur. No phosphorus. Excellent for maintenance where soil P is adequate. Sulfur helps lower soil pH.

best_32_0_8.application_notes: BEST high-nitrogen professional granular fertilizer. Economical coverage for large turf areas. No phosphorus formulation. Apply during active growing season.

best_35_0_5.application_notes: BEST highest nitrogen granular formulation. Very economical per-acre cost for large areas. Use for quick green-up during active growth periods. No phosphorus.

best_18_3_18_fe.application_notes: BEST balanced granular fertilizer with high potassium for stress tolerance. 2% iron for enhanced color. Ideal for fall/winter prep and summer stress programs on cool-season turf.

best_14_14_14.application_notes: BEST triple-14 balanced granular fertilizer. Equal NPK ratio for general landscape and turf applications. Suitable for new plantings and bed preparation.

best_10_20_20.application_notes: BEST starter/winterizer with high phosphorus and potassium. Use at seeding or for fall winterization programs. Promotes strong root development and cold hardiness.

best_46_0_0_urea.application_notes: BEST granular urea, 46% nitrogen. Economical nitrogen source for quick green-up. Water in promptly after application to reduce volatilization. Avoid application on hot, humid days.

best_21_0_0_ammonium_sulfate.application_notes: BEST ammonium sulfate providing 21% nitrogen and 24% sulfur. Acidifying fertilizer that helps lower soil pH. Good for alkaline soils and sulfur-deficient turf.

polyon_25_5_10_cr.application_notes: Polyon polymer-coated controlled-release fertilizer. Reactive Layers Coating (RLC) technology provides consistent, temperature-dependent nutrient release over 8-12 weeks. Reduces burn potential and leaching.

polyon_32_0_10_cr.application_notes: Polyon controlled-release high-nitrogen formulation with no phosphorus. RLC polymer coating provides 8-12 week sustained feeding. Ideal for fairways and large turf areas where P is not needed.

polyon_24_5_11_cr.application_notes: Polyon polymer-coated controlled-release with balanced NPK. Iron for color enhancement. RLC technology releases nutrients over 8-12 weeks based on soil temperature.

polyon_20_0_20_cr.application_notes: Polyon controlled-release with equal N:K ratio. No phosphorus. Polymer-coated for 8-12 week sustained release. Excellent for fall winterization and stress recovery programs.

polyon_18_5_18_cr.application_notes: Polyon polymer-coated controlled-release with high K for stress resistance. 3% sulfur. RLC coating technology for 8-12 week sustained feeding.

polyon_43_0_0_cr_urea.application_notes: Polyon polymer-coated controlled-release urea. 100% coated nitrogen for sustained 10-14 week release. Excellent for blending. Reduces N leaching and volatilization compared to uncoated urea.

duration_cr_25_0_8.application_notes: Duration CR controlled-release fertilizer with 45-day release curve. Polymer-coated nitrogen with iron and manganese for consistent color. Ideal for greens and tees where frequent, lighter feeding is preferred.

duration_cr_24_4_12_90day.application_notes: Duration CR with 90-day controlled-release curve. Extended feeding reduces application frequency. Polymer coating with RLC technology. Suitable for fairways and sports turf.

duration_cr_28_0_6_120day.application_notes: Duration CR with 120-day (4-month) controlled-release curve. Longest release duration in the Duration line. Reduces labor costs with fewer applications. No phosphorus.

duration_cr_18_0_18_90day.application_notes: Duration CR balanced N:K formulation with 90-day controlled release. Iron and sulfur for color and soil health. Ideal for fall winterization with sustained potassium delivery.

turfgro_28_3_10_fe.application_notes: TurfGro professional-grade granular fertilizer with iron for color. Blend of quick-release and slow-release nitrogen. Good for fairways and athletic fields during growing season.

turfgro_24_0_10_50scr.application_notes: TurfGro with 50% sulfur-coated urea (SCU) for extended nitrogen release. No phosphorus formulation with 5% sulfur. Cost-effective slow-release option for fairways and roughs.

turfgro_22_0_22.application_notes: TurfGro winterizer/fall fertilizer with balanced N:K ratio. High potassium for cold hardiness and winter stress tolerance. No phosphorus formulation.

turfgro_16_25_12_starter.application_notes: TurfGro starter fertilizer with high phosphorus for root development. Use at seeding, sodding, or renovation. Smaller particle size (SGN 150) for improved seed contact.

turfgro_30_0_0_scu.application_notes: TurfGro sulfur-coated urea (SCU). 100% slow-release nitrogen with sulfur coating providing extended feeding. 10% sulfur. Economical nitrogen source for roughs and low-maintenance areas.

simplot_liquid_28_0_0.application_notes: Simplot UAN (urea-ammonium nitrate) liquid nitrogen solution. Blend of urea, ammonium nitrate, and water. Versatile liquid nitrogen source for foliar or soil application. Tank-mix compatible.

simplot_liquid_32_0_0.application_notes: Simplot 32% UAN liquid nitrogen solution. Higher concentration UAN for efficient nitrogen delivery. Use caution with foliar rates to avoid burn. Best for soil injection or fertigation.

simplot_liquid_12_0_0_4fe.application_notes: Simplot liquid iron with nitrogen. 4% chelated iron for dark green color without excessive growth. Foliar application for rapid color response. Tank-mix compatible with most pesticides.

simplot_liquid_6_0_0_6fe.application_notes: Simplot high-iron liquid with manganese and magnesium micronutrients. 6% chelated iron for maximum color enhancement with low nitrogen. Excellent for color spoon-feeding greens and tees.

simplot_liquid_10_3_8.application_notes: Simplot complete liquid fertilizer with NPK and micronutrients. Balanced formulation for foliar or soil application. Good for regular spoon-feeding programs on greens and tees.

simplot_liquid_3_0_8_12fe.application_notes: Simplot ultra-high iron liquid with potassium and sulfur. 12% iron for maximum darkening effect with minimal nitrogen. Use for tournament prep or deep green color on greens and fairways.

simplot_liquid_0_0_25_potash.application_notes: Simplot liquid potassium solution. Potassium carbonate-based for rapid K uptake. Use for stress preparation, fall hardening, and supplemental potassium without adding nitrogen.

best_0_0_62_muriate_of_potash.application_notes: BEST muriate of potash (potassium chloride). 62% K2O for potassium supplementation. Use when soil test K is low. Apply based on soil test recommendations. Avoid on salt-sensitive turf.

best_0_0_50_sulfate_of_potash.application_notes: BEST sulfate of potash (K2SO4). Low salt index potassium source with 18% sulfur. Preferred over muriate for sensitive turf areas. Apply based on soil test recommendations.

best_0_46_0_dap.application_notes: BEST diammonium phosphate (DAP). High phosphorus source for establishment and soil P building. Use based on soil test. Excellent for blending.

best_11_52_0_map.application_notes: BEST monoammonium phosphate (MAP). Highest phosphorus content granular. Lower pH reaction than DAP. Use for establishing turf or correcting severe P deficiency based on soil test.

simplot_gypsum_calcium_sulfate.application_notes: Simplot granular gypsum (calcium sulfate dihydrate). 23% calcium and 18% sulfur. Improves soil structure and water infiltration in sodic/compacted soils. Does not significantly change soil pH. Apply 10-50 lbs/1000 sq ft based on soil conditions.

simplot_calcitic_lime.application_notes: Simplot calcitic limestone. Raises soil pH in acidic soils. 36% calcium. Apply based on soil test buffer pH recommendation. Typical rates 15-50 lbs/1000 sq ft depending on soil pH and buffer.

simplot_dolomitic_lime.application_notes: Simplot dolomitic limestone. Raises soil pH while supplying calcium and magnesium. Use when both pH and Mg are low based on soil testing. 22% Ca, 12% Mg.

simplot_sulfur_granular.application_notes: Simplot elemental sulfur for lowering soil pH. 90% sulfur. Apply 3-5 lbs/1000 sq ft to lower pH approximately 0.5 units in sandy soils. Multiple applications may be needed for clay soils. Soil bacteria convert to sulfuric acid.

polyon_42_0_0_cr_coated.application_notes: Polyon polymer-coated urea with 90-day release profile. 100% controlled-release nitrogen. Ideal for blending with other granular fertilizers to add slow-release N component.

polyon_38_0_0_cr_180day.application_notes: Polyon polymer-coated urea with 180-day (6-month) release. Longest release duration Polyon coating. Ideal for ornamental beds, low-maintenance turf, and blending.

best_25_5_10_50polyon.application_notes: BEST professional granular with 50% Polyon controlled-release nitrogen. Combination of quick green-up and sustained feeding for 8-10 weeks. 2% iron. Ideal for fairways and athletic fields.

best_24_0_11_50polyon.application_notes: BEST no-phosphorus granular with 50% Polyon controlled-release N. Quick initial response plus sustained feeding. Iron for color. For areas where P application is restricted.

best_20_0_20_50polyon.application_notes: BEST balanced N:K granular with 50% Polyon controlled-release nitrogen. No phosphorus. Iron for color. Combination of immediate and sustained feeding for stress management.

simplot_liquid_15_0_5_2fe.application_notes: Simplot liquid fertilizer with nitrogen, potassium, iron, and manganese. No phosphorus. Good for maintenance foliar programs on greens and tees where P is not needed.

simplot_micronutrient_blend_liquid.application_notes: Simplot complete micronutrient blend. Chelated iron, manganese, zinc, copper, boron, and molybdenum. For correcting micronutrient deficiencies identified by soil or tissue testing.

best_15_5_10_75polyon_mini.application_notes: BEST mini-prill (SGN 100) for greens and tees. 75% Polyon controlled-release nitrogen for sustained feeding with minimal surge growth. 3% iron for deep color. Small particle size for tight mowing heights.

best_18_3_12_75polyon_mini.application_notes: BEST mini-prill with 75% Polyon CR nitrogen. Complete NPK with iron and manganese. SGN 100 for greens and tees. Consistent feeding over 8-10 weeks with minimal growth surge.
